title: Lich Bane on Viktor? Thoughts?
body: I can't decide whether I like it or not.

replies.body: if you know you can safely close enough to auto someone in teamfights yes
If you watch faker, whos an amazing viktor player, he builds it when he can afford to play closer to their team and dps, but doesnt when he has to play further back and poke/burst

Isn't that semi-core on him?
Because of his Q: Where your next AA deals extra damage already.
